DOC.brief_summary: A prospective , randomize , control , multi-center study safety effectiveness JUVEDERM® Ultra XC injectable gel versus Belotero Balance® perioral line
DOC.brief_title: JUVEDERM® Ultra XC vs. Belotero Balance® Perioral Lines
DOC.criteria: Have moderate severe perioral line assess Investigator use 4point POLSS ( none , mild , moderate , severe ) Accept obligation receive facial procedure treatment time study study relate Have lip tattoo , facial hair scar would interfere visualization lip perioral area effectiveness assessment Have denture device cover part upper palate , and/or severe malocclusion , dentofacial maxillofacial deformity , significant asymmetry perioral area , judge Treating Investigator Have history skin cancer Is active smoker Has noticeable acne scarring , active inflammation , infection , cancerous precancerous lesion , unhealed wound mouth area Have active oral herpes cold sore within 12 month Have undergone oral surgery dental procedure ( e.g. , tooth extraction , orthodontia , implantation ) within 30 day prior enrollment plan undergo procedure study Have undergo cosmetic facial perioral area procedure [ e.g. , facelift , surgery may alter appearance perioral area , include tissue grafting , tissue augmentation silicone , fat , permanent filler ] plan undergo procedure time study Have undergo temporary semipermanent facial dermal filler injection ( e.g. , hyaluronic acid , calcium hydroxylapatite , LPolylactic acid ) low face ( orbital rim ) within 24 month Have receive mesotherapy , resurface ( laser , photomodulation , intense pulse light , radio frequency , dermabrasion , chemical peel , ablative nonablative procedure ) within 6 month prior entry study planning undergo procedure time study study relate procedure . Have begin use new overthecounter prescription , oral topical , antiwrinkle product treatment area within 90 day prior enrollment plan begin use product time study . [ NOTE : Use sunscreen continue therapy cosmeceuticals ( e.g. , alpha hydroxyl acid , glycolic acid , retinol , retinoic acid ) allow regimen establish ≥ 90 day prior enrollment ] Have epilation ( e.g . laser hair removal , electrolysis , thread , etc . ) perioral area perform within 3 month Have receive treatment botulinum toxin serotype indication lower face [ infraorbital rim ( IORs ) ] within 1 year baseline visit
